comments: Numbers n for which the expression 11^n/(n+1) is an integer. - _Paolo P. Lava_, May 29 2006
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,-11).
formula: G.f.: 1/(1-11*x)-1/(1-x). [_Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jan 14 2009]E.g.f.: e^(11*x)-e^x. [_Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jan 14 2009]a(n) = 11*a(n-1)+10 for n>0, a(0)=0. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2010]a(n) = Sum_{i=1..n} 10^i*binomial(n,n-i) for n>0, a(0)=0. [_Bruno Berselli_, Nov 11 2015]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
